Package arb.functions.complex

Class SFunction

java.lang.Object
arb.functions.complex.SFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComplexFunction, Function<Complex,Complex>, AutoCloseable
public class SFunction extends Object implements ComplexFunction, AutoCloseable
The rational meromorphic quartic S(t)=tanh(ln(1-t^2)))=((1 - t^2)^2 - 1)/((1 - t^2)^2 + 1)
Author:
Stephen Crowley

    • evaluateDerivative

      protected Complex evaluateDerivative(Complex t, int prec, Complex res1)
      Evaluate the derivative of S(t)
      Parameters:
      t -
      prec -
      res -
      Returns:
      (8*(t-1)*t*(t+1)) / (t^4 - 2*a*(t-1)*(t+1))^2

    • evaluate2ndDerivative

      protected Complex evaluate2ndDerivative(Complex t, int prec, Complex res)
      Evaluate the 2nd derivative of S(t)
      Parameters:
      t -
      prec -
      res -
      Returns:
      -8*(2 - 9t^4 + 5t^6 ) / (2 - 2t^2 +t^4)^3
